common.slow-on-mobile: Please wait. This process may take a minute or more on some mobile devices and slow PCs.

errors.fetch-version: Unable to fetch latest release version from Github
errors.loading-error: Error trying to get the data. Please try again later.
errors.wasm-no-available: The web browser you are using is not compatible with this wallet (it is not fully compatible with WebAssembly). Please update your browser or try using a different one.
errors.wasm-not-downloaded: There was a problem when trying to download an important component. Please check your internet connection and try again.

header.synchronizing: The node is synchronizing. Data you see may not be updated.
header.pending-txs3: Data you see may not be updated.
header.connection-error-tooltip: There was an error while trying to refresh the balance

errors.no-connections: No connections active, web client is not connected to any other nodes!
errors.no-backend1: Cannot reach backend. Please refresh the page and/or seek help on our
errors.csrf: Security vulnerability: CSRF is not working, please exit immediately.

buy.deposit-address: Choose an address to generate a BTC deposit link for:
buy.deposit-location-desc: Choose a wallet where you'd like us to deposit your Skycoin after we receive your Bitcoin.
buy.wallets-desc: Each time a new wallet and address are selected, a new BTC address is generated. A single Skycoin address can have up to 5 BTC addresses assigned to it.
buy.send-desc: Send Bitcoin to the address below. Once received, we will deposit the Skycoin to a new address in the wallet selected above at the current rate of {{ rate }} SKY/BTC.
buy.fraction-warning: Only send multiple of the SKY/BTC rate! Skycoin is sent in whole number; fractional SKY is not sent!
buy.receive-desc: After receiving your Bitcoin, we'll send you your Skycoin. It may take anywhere between 20 minutes and an hour to receive your SKY.
buy.otc-disabled: Sorry, otc has currently been disabled!
buy.details: You can buy Skycoins directly from your wallet using our Skycoin Teller service. The current rate is 0.0002 BTC per SKY. To buy SKY, request a BTC deposit address. Once you have a BTC deposit address, any BTC deposits will   automatically be added to your selected address.

wizard.wallet-desc: If you don't have a wallet, use the generated seed to create a new one. If you already have a wallet, toggle over to "Load Wallet" and enter your seed.
wizard.encrypt-desc: Increase security of your wallet by encrypting it. By entering a password below, your wallet will be encrypted. Only those with the password will be able access the wallet and remove funds.

confirm.title: Safeguard your seed!
confirm.desc: We want to make sure that you wrote down your seed and stored it in a safe place. If you forget your seed, you WILL NOT be able to recover your wallet!

change-coin.with-wallet: Coins you have created wallets for:
change-coin.without-wallet: Coins you have not created wallets for:
change-coin.no-results: No coins match the search term
change-coin.injecting-tx: It is not possible to change the coin while a transaction is being sent.

wallet.hw-security-warning: Possible security risk. Access the Skywallet options (by pressing the "Skywallet" button below the wallets list) while the device is connected for more information.
wallet.locked-tooltip: The seed is necessary to send transactions
wallet.unlocked-tooltip: Wallet temporarily unlocked to send transactions
wallet.hw-delete-confirmation: WARNING: The wallet "{{ name }}" will be removed from the list. To add it again, you will have to reconnect the device and open the Skywallet options (by pressing the "Skywallet" button below the wallets list). Do you want to continue?
wallet.delete-confirmation2: will be deleted. If you forget your seed, you will not be able to recover this wallet! Do you want to continue?
wallet.delete-confirmation-check: Yeah, I want to delete the wallet.
wallet.add-confirmation: If you add more addresses, the process of unlocking the wallet to perform certain operations will take more time. Do you want to continue?
wallet.already-adding-address-error: An address is already being added. Please wait.
wallet.max-hardware-wallets-error: You have already reached the max number of addresses that can be added to the Skywallet.

new.seed-warning: Remember this seed! Keep it in a safe place. If you forget your seed, you will not be able to recover your wallet!
new.encrypt-warning: We suggest that you encrypt each one of your wallets with a password. If you forget your password, you can reset it with your seed. Make sure you have your seed saved somewhere safe before encrypting your wallet.
new.unconventional-seed-text: You introduced an unconventional seed. If you did it for any special reason, you can continue (only recommended for advanced users). However, if your intention is to use a normal system seed, you must delete all the additional text and special characters.
new.wallet-created: The wallet has been added to the list.

scan.connection-error: It is not possible to connect to the server. Please try again later.
scan.unsynchronized-node-error: It is not possible to restore the addresses because the server is not synchronized. Please try again later.
scan.title: Restoring addresses

unlock.confirmation-warning-title: Important: without the seed you will lose access to your funds
unlock.confirmation-warning-text1: For security reasons, this wallet will not be saved and you will need the seed to access it again after closing/refreshing the current browser tab. If you did not safeguard it, you will lose access to the funds. To confirm that you have safeguarded the seed and to be able to see the addresses of this wallet, please re-enter the seed in the box below.
unlock.confirmation-warning-text2-1: If you do not have the seed, you can delete the wallet by clicking

qr.title: Address
qr.copied: The text has been copied to the clipboard.

send.synchronizing-warning: The node is still synchronizing the data, so the balance shown may be incorrect. Are you sure you want to continue?
send.addresses-help: Limit the addresses from where the coins and hours could be sent
send.all-addresses: All the addresses of the selected wallet
send.outputs-help: Limit the unspent outputs from where the coins and hours could be sent. Only the outputs from the selected addresses are shown
send.all-outputs: All the outputs of the selected addresses
send.available-msg-part1: With your current selection you can send up to
send.available-msg-part4: must be used for the transaction fee).
send.change-address-help: Address to receive change. If it's not provided, it will be chosen automatically. Click on the "Select" link to choose an address from one of your wallets
send.destinations-help2: Destination addresses, their coins and coin hours
send.value-help: The higher the value, the more coin hours will be sent to outputs

tx.none: There are still no transactions to show

backup.seed-warning: BACKUP YOUR SEED. ON PAPER. IN A SAFE PLACE. As long as you have your seed, you can recover your coins.
backup.desc:
Use the table below to get seeds from your encrypted wallets.
To get seeds from unencrypted wallets, open the folder above, open the .wlt files in a text editor and recover the seeds.

pending-txs.none: Currently there are no pending transactions

change.url-label: Node URL (leave empty to use the default URL)
change.url-error: The entered host is already in use for this or another coin.
change.connection-error: It was not possible to connect to the node. Please check the URL and your internet connection and try again.
change.csrf-error: It is not possible to connect to the specified node since it is configured to use CSRF tokens.
change.invalid-version-error: The specified node is not compatible with this wallet. The node must be updated to at least version 0.24.0.

confirmation.title: Security
confirmation.text: Do you really want to allow access to "{{ url }}"?

history.no-txs-filter: There are no transactions matching the current filter criteria
history.no-filter: No filter active (press to select wallets/addresses)

disclaimer.disclaimer-description: By continuing, you understand the risks related to the use of cryptographic tokens & blockchain-based software, the Skycoin wallets, and the Skycoin cryptocurrency. You understand that this product is provided as-is, and agree to the Terms and Conditions governing the usage of this product.

disclaimer.disclaimer-desc: IF YOU USE THIS WALLET YOU MAY LOSE COINS. TESTING PURPOSES ONLY.

wallet.address-without-seed: trying to generate address without seed!
wallet.unknown-address: trying to update the wallet with unknown address!
wallet.wallet-exists: A wallet already exists with this seed

general.error-disconnected: Unable to perform the operation. The Skywallet is not connected.
general.simple-error: Error. Unable to perform the operation.
general.generic-error: Unable to perform the operation. Make sure you have connected a valid Skywallet and that it is not waiting for input.
general.generic-error-internet: Unable to perform the operation. Make sure you have connected a valid Skywallet that is not waiting for input and that you have a connection to the internet/node.
general.error-incorrect-wallet: Unable to perform the operation. The connected Skywallet is different from the expected one.
general.error-incorrect-pin: Unable to perform the operation. The PIN you have entered is incorrect.
general.confirm: Please confirm the operation on the Skywallet.
general.confirm-and-more: Please confirm the operation on the Skywallet and follow the instructions displayed.
general.follow: Please follow the instructions displayed on the Skywallet.
general.refused: The operation failed or was canceled.
general.name-updated: The name used to identify this Skywallet in the wallet list has been updated to match the one shown on the device.

errors.too-many-inputs-outputs: The transaction has too many inputs or outputs for the Skywallet. Please try again creating several smaller transactions, each one with a smaller number of recipients (if the current transaction has many) or coins.
errors.daemon-connection: Problem connecting to the Skywallet service.
errors.timeout: The operation was canceled due to inactivity. Please try again.
errors.invalid-address-generated: There was a problem with the address generator and the operation had to be canceled.
errors.not-in-bootloader-mode: To use this option the Skywallet must be in bootloader mode.
errors.incompatible-node: The node to which you are connected cannot perform this operation with a hardware wallet. Please connect to a node running v0.26.0 or higher.

security-warning.title: Security warning
security-warning.text: The last time this Skywallet was connected, one or more security warnings were found. We recommend that you open the Skywallet options (by pressing the link below) while the device is connected and solve the security problems before continuing.
security-warning.check: I understand the risks and want to continue

options.disconnected: No Skywallet detected. Please connect a Skywallet to use this option.
options.unconfigured-detected: A seedless Skywallet has been detected. Select "Configure automatically" if you want to configure it as a brand new wallet and start using it. Select "Restore backup" if you want to configure the Skywallet with a previously created seed backup.
options.configured-detected: Skywallet detected. The device is identified in the wallets list as:
options.unchecked-version-warning: It was not possible to verify if the firmware of your Skywallet is up to date. This could be due to problems with your internet connection or because the service is under maintenance.
options.outdated-version-warning: The firmware of your Skywallet is outdated. We recommend you to update it as soon as possible to ensure safety. To do this, select the "Update firmware" option.
options.backup-warning: You should backup the Skywallet seed or you could lose access to the funds in case of problems. To do this, select the "Create a backup" option.
options.pin-warning: The connected Skywallet does not have a PIN. The PIN code protects the Skywallet from unauthorized parties accessing the device. To create a PIN code, select the "Create PIN code" option.
options.forgotten-pin1: If you cannot access the wallet because you have forgotten the PIN, you can wipe the Skywallet and then restore it with the seed by clicking

update-firmware-warning.title: Outdated Firmware
update-firmware-warning.text: WARNING: the firmware in your Skywallet is outdated. To stay safe, it is recommended to update it.

update-firmware.text-bootloader: WARNING: if you have already configured this device, before continuing you must have a backup of your seed or you could permanently lose access to the funds.
update-firmware.text-not-bootloader: To update the firmware of your Skywallet you must connect it in bootloader mode (connect it to the computer while pressing the two physical buttons of the device). WARNING: if you have already configured this device, before continuing you must have a backup of your seed or you could permanently lose access to the funds.
update-firmware.text-no-firmware: Welcome. The currently connected Skywallet does not have a firmware installed. A firmware will now be installed so you can start using the device. NOTE: if you have already configured this device and want to recover the funds, you will need your seed.
update-firmware.check: I understand the risks and want to continue
update-firmware.follow: The firmware update has been sent to the Skywallet. Please continue the process on the device.
update-firmware.connection-error: It was not possible to download the firmware. This could be due to problems with your internet connection or because the service is under maintenance.
update-firmware.timeout: The operation was canceled due to inactivity. Please disconnect the device, reconnect it and try again.
update-firmware.finished: Your device has been configured correctly. Please unplug it before continuing.

generate-seed.text: Before proceeding, you can select the number of words you want the seed to have. The seed is a list of words that can be used to recover access to the coins in case of problems. Both values are safe, so if you do not have a special reason for selecting one or the other, you can leave the default value.

restore-seed.text: Before proceeding, please select the number of words that the seed you want to recover has.
restore-seed.check-text: You can use this option to enter a seed and check if it is equal to the one in the Skywallet. Before start, select the number of words the seed you want to check has.
restore-seed.warning: WARNING: to avoid potential problems, use only seeds created with a Skywallet.
restore-seed.error-wrong-word: Error: The retyped word does not match the one requested by the Skywallet.
restore-seed.error-invalid-seed: Error: The seed is not valid. Please be sure to enter the correct words in the correct order.
restore-seed.error-wrong-seed: Error: The seed is valid but does not match the one in the device.
restore-seed.correct-seed: The seed is valid and matches the one in the device.

added.title: New Skywallet
added.added1: The connected Skywallet has been added to the wallets list with the following name:
added.added2: Now you can check the balance and the addresses of the Skywallet even when it is not connected. Additionally, you can change the name of the wallet or remove it from the wallets list, if you wish.
added.characters-warning: If you use non-standard English characters, the name may not be displayed correctly on the device.

wipe.warning: WARNING: All the data on the Skywallet will be deleted. If you do not have a backup, you will not be able to access your funds again.
wipe.confirm-delete: Also remove from the wallets list

create-backup.warning: WARNING: You can only create a backup of your Skywallet seed once. If you decide to continue, you will have to write down a group of words (it is recommended to do it on paper and not on a computer) that will appear on the screen of the Skywallet and store the list in a safe place. Anyone with access to the word list (the "seed") will be able access the wallet funds, so extreme caution is advised.
create-backup.instructions: Write down the word list that appear on the screen of the Skywallet. Make sure you respect the order and write each word correctly.

seed-word.title: Enter word
seed-word.info1: Enter the word shown on the device
seed-word.info2: You will be asked to enter the words of your backup seed in random order. Also, additional random words could be requested.
seed-word.error-invalid-word: The entered word is not valid.
seed-word.error-loading-words: Loading the word list. Please wait.

change-pin.pin-mismatch: Unable to perform the operation. The PINs you have entered do not match.

remove-pin.warning: WARNING: It is not recommended to remove the PIN code from your Skywallet, as it will be vulnerable to being used by unauthorized parties in case of loss or theft.
remove-pin.check: I understand the risks and want to continue

enter-pin.title: Enter PIN
enter-pin.instructions: The PIN layout is displayed on the Skywallet screen.
enter-pin.instructions-tx: Enter the PIN to confirm and sign the transaction.
enter-pin.instructions-change: Please enter a secure PIN consisting of 4 to 8 numbers.

pin-help.title: Help
pin-help.part1: When it is necessary to enter the PIN to continue, the Skywallet screen will display a matrix of 9 boxes with numbers in random order (the order changes each time) and you will be asked to enter the PIN in the software wallet using a matrix of 9 buttons that simply show the symbol â€¢.
pin-help.part2: To enter the PIN, look at the position of the PIN numbers in numbers matrix on the screen of the Skywallet and press the corresponding buttons in the software wallet. For example, if the PIN is "23" and the number 2 is in the upper left, number 3 in the middle of the Skywallet numbers matrix, press the upper left and middle button in that order in the software wallet.
pin-help.part3: If you wish, you can also use the numpad on your keyboard to enter the PIN. However, as in the previous example, if the PIN is "23", you can not simply type "23" with the numpad, but you will have to press the keys that are in the position where the numbers 2 and 3 are shown on the screen of the Skywallet. Taking into account the previous example, you would have to press the "7" and "5" keys, because those are the keys that you are in the same position as the numbers shown by the Skywallet.

create-tx.title: Create transaction
create-tx.upper-text: Please confirm the operation in the Skywallet after verifying if the following data matches EXACTLY with the transaction you wish to send and with those shown by the Skywallet:
create-tx.lower-text: If any data does not correspond to what the Skywallet shows or the transaction you wish to send, cancel the operation on your Skywallet.

confirm-address.title: Confirm address
confirm-address.instructions: Please confirm on the Skywallet if the address is:
confirm-address.confirmation: Address confirmed. For security, you can re-show the address in the Skywallet using the "Confirm address" option, in the menu that you can display by pressing the button at the right of the address balance.
